headline: Danaher Corp (NYSE:DHR): A Bullish Investment Perspective
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Danaher Corp (DHR) on ValueInvestorsClub by valueinvestor03. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on DHR. DHR’s stock was trading at $250 when this thesis was published, vs. a closing price of $230.84 on November 19. DHR is a diversified life sciences company with immense growth and evolution, […]
